ActJudges Act
SubjectGail Dianne Low ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Richard T. Low **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to GAIL DIANNE LOW, survivor of the Hon. Richard T. Low, a Judge of the Court of Appeal of British Columbia, effective August 16, 2014.
